doc:
Adda Gleason https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adda_Gleason 0 Adda Gleason (December 19, 1888 – February 6, 1971) was an American actress. Gleason was born in Chicago, Illinois. She starred in the 1916 film adaptation of Ramona. She died in Los Angeles, California. Adda_Gleason ( December_19_,_1888 – February_6 , 1971 ) was an_American_actress . Gleason was_born in Chicago , Illinois . She starred in the_1916_film_adaptation of Ramona . She died in Los_Angeles , California .
